sentences.en: " Anybody who expected a breakthrough in Geneva was a fool,'said a White House official.
sentences.cn: 白宫的一位官员说, “ 谁指望日内瓦会谈会取得突破,谁就是个傻瓜. ”

sentences.en: All of these is to the breakthrough of life phrase traditional contents.
sentences.cn: 这些都是对寿词传统内容的突破.

sentences.en: And the year is ending with no Doha breakthrough in sight.
sentences.cn: 年关已近,多哈谈判仍无突破迹象.

sentences.en: Derek jones: months. i think it's a real breakthrough.
sentences.cn: 德里克.琼斯: 好几个月. 我认为这是个突破.

sentences.en: God willing, there will be a breakthrough.
sentences.cn: 如果一切顺利，将会取得突破性的进展。

sentences.en: If such materials became generally available to the optics industry the payoffs from such a breakthrough would be enormous.
sentences.cn: 如果这些材料能够普遍用于光学产业，那么这一突破带来的收益将非常巨大。

sentences.en: Is it the breakthrough we've been waiting for?
sentences.cn: 这就是我们一直盼望的突破 吗 ?

sentences.en: Scientists are on the threshold of a breakthrough in their treatment of that disease.
sentences.cn: 科学家在治疗那种疾病方面很快就要取得突破.

sentences.en: Scientists have made a breakthrough in their treatment of that disease.
sentences.cn: 科学家在治疗那种疾病方面已有突破.

sentences.en: Scientists have made a major breakthrough in the treatment of cancer.
sentences.cn: 科学家在癌症治疗方面取得了重大突破。

sentences.en: Successful leaders view every conflict, even crises, as a win - win breakthrough.
sentences.cn: 成功的领导者把每一次争执, 甚至把危机也当成双赢的突破口.

sentences.en: The company looks poised to make a significant breakthrough in China.
sentences.cn: 这家公司看来很有把握在中国取得重大突破。

sentences.en: The scientists strive for a breakthrough in cancer research.
sentences.cn: 科学家们力争在癌症研究方面有个突破.

sentences.en: They announced, amid much ballyhoo, that they had made a breakthrough.
sentences.cn: 在一通大吹大擂中，他们宣布自己取得了突破。

sentences.en: With breast cancer, as with many common diseases, there is no obvious breakthrough on the horizon.
sentences.cn: 对乳腺癌等很多常见疾病来说，目前还看不到有明显的突破。

sentences.en: You've had a breakthrough to get better fuel economy.
sentences.cn: 你在节省汽油的技术方面有了新的突破.

trans.tran_en: an important new discovery in something you are studying, especially one made after trying for a long time
